original_text:
By the blast of your nostrils
    the waters piled up.
The surging waters stood up like a wall;
    the deep waters congealed in the heart of the sea.
korean_text: 주의 콧김에 물이 쌓이되 파도가 언덕 같이 일어서고 큰 물이 바다 가운데 엉기니이다

sentences.original_text: By the blast of your nostrils
The surging waters stood up like a wall
the deep waters congealed in the heart of the sea
